page.title: 02MAJOR INDUSTRIES
page.content: {John Brown's}was established at Clydebank in 1899 as a shipbuilder. Main shipbuilding achievements were the launch in 1907 of the Lusitania,in 1934 of the Queen Mary,in 1938 of the Queen Elizabeth,in 1953 of the Royal Yacht Britannia and in 1967 of the Queen Elizabeth II. John Brown Engineering has developed from being a supplier of gas turbines to a major power engineering contractor. 1370 people are employed in J.B.E. compared to the 12,000 who were employed in it's heyday. J.B.E. now hope to diversify from turbines to building hydro-electric power stations etc.{ {U.I.E.}was formed from Marathon in 1972.
